column1: NLB Spring 2014~In Progress~Korea~http://nicegame.tv/~16~After being eliminated from OGN Champions league
column2: teams are seeded into NLB. They are seeded deeper into the tournament as a result of good performance in OGN Champions league. column1: OGN Masters 2014~In Progress~Korea~http://www.ognlol.com~17~7 eSports organizations duke it out in a tournament for 100
column3: 000 KRW and spots in the World Championship Qualifier! Both teams are required to field different teams in the first two matches of a Bo3. In the third game the organizations may use a mixture of any players from either of their 'A' or 'B' teams. These 'Masters' matches allow organizations to get creative with team compositions and team playstyles. ~~~

column1: NA LCS Summer 2014~Upcoming~NA~http://na.lolesports.com/na-lcs/2014/split2/~15~8 North American teams compete in a 10 week league to be seeded into a playoff bracket. The top 3 teams of the split get the chance to represent America at the World Championships in South Korea. ~~Promotion Tournament#NA LCS Summer 2014 Promotion Tournament~
